title: Hour 1: Watson Suspension
description:
Harry Douglas, Damien Woody and Domonique Foxworth all join the show to discuss the suspension of Deshaun Watson. Plus the crew debates who will be more impacted by losing their top weapon, Patrick Mahomes or Aaron Rodgers. The crew also discuss if Bill Belichick is making a mistake by not naming an Offensive Coordinator. Later the crew debates if Deebo Samuel should accept a dual-threat role in the 49ers offense.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: Hour 1: Deshaun Watson suspended 6 games
